advancements.kaleidoscope.root.title: Kaleidoscope
advancements.kaleidoscope.root.descripti: Add a touch of Fantasy to the World!
advancements.kaleidoscope.wand_1.title: Command the World
advancements.kaleidoscope.wand_1.descrip: Use Wands of Edit for 50 times
advancements.kaleidoscope.wand_2.title: Strive for excellence
advancements.kaleidoscope.wand_2.descrip: Use Wands of Edit for 2,000 times
advancements.kaleidoscope.wand_3.title: What's the Point?
advancements.kaleidoscope.wand_3.descrip: Use Wands of Edit for 100,000 times, and then reevaluate your life choices
advancements.kaleidoscope.tutorial.credi:
§6Player Dolls to express gratitude to sponsors during the internal testing phase.
Thank you to every player for your support!
§bYou can use these Mysterious Wands to Move, Rotate or Transform the Models!
lore.kaleidoscope.wand_1.1: Rotate models by Hitting or Interacting with them!
lore.kaleidoscope.wand_1.2: Stand and Click for Horizontal Rotation
lore.kaleidoscope.wand_1.3: Sneak and Click for Vertical Rotation
lore.kaleidoscope.wand_2.1: Move models by Hitting or Interacting with them!
lore.kaleidoscope.wand_2.2: Stand and Click for Horizontal Movement
lore.kaleidoscope.wand_2.3: Sneak and Click for Vertical Movement
lore.kaleidoscope.wand_3: Transform the state of Some model by Hitting or Interacting with them!
